name: @nouns/subgraph
description: A subgraph that indexes nouns events
author: Nounders

scripts.deploy-studio:mainnet: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:mainnet && pnpm build && graph deploy --studio nouns
scripts.deploy-studio:sepolia: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:sepolia && pnpm build && graph deploy --studio nouns-sepolia
scripts.deploy:hardhat: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:hardhat && pnpm codegen && pnpm create:localnode nounsdao/nouns-subgraph && pnpm deploy:localnode nounsdao/nouns-subgraph
scripts.deploy:mainnet: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:mainnet && pnpm build && graph deploy nouns-mainnet --version-label $npm_package_version
scripts.deploy:sepolia: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:sepolia && pnpm build && graph deploy nouns-sepolia --version-label $npm_package_version
scripts.pretest: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:sepolia && pnpm build
